title: Encana Price Target Raised to C$9.00 (ECA)
content: Encana (TSE:ECA) had its price target boosted by CIBC from C$8.50 to C$9.00 in a research note published on Wednesday, MarketBeat reports. A number of other equities research analysts have also recently commented on the stock. Citigroup Inc. cut their price objective on shares of Encana from C$9.00 to C$8.50 and set a neutral rating […]
